description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Challenge your avatar against a host of Dirchie characters in fast and furious single or up to 4 player split screen multiplayer karting. Featuring standard cup races and a unique party mode, where the players alternately select from Race, Battle and Drag events across 5 or 10 rounds. On top of these modes are numerous modifiers and a penalty system so you can customise your experience..
